CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Time is 21:07. Chi is not a very good reader. Mot lets her struggle with the words , then gives the next word or corrects her when she makes a major mistake. Chi uses the cues from the repetitive text and from the pictures to help her along a bit , but it's still pretty slow going.
MOT and Chi sit on separate couches that are perpendicular to each other. Bro is running around and Sis sits next to Mot
Chi uses her finger to point to the words

u.a: is using knowledge of text to give the refrain
takes Chi's finger and points to the word (or the picture)
context notes say Bro whispering wrong word to Chi
turns and looks at Mot for help
